articles.title: Australia v England: Travis Head and David Warner smash hosts to ODI series sweep - BBC
articles.description: Travis Head and David Warner share a record 269-run stand as Australia beat England by 221 runs in the third ODI in Melbourne.
articles.content:
Travis Head hit a blistering 152 from 130 balls as Australia dominated in Melbourne
Third one-day international, Melbourne Cricket Ground
